transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Ha mam. Ha mam.
Executive: Yeah, who is this?
Customer: Uh mam this is Deepika we interacted now.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Ha so as you informed your seniors like we won't be providing field visit.
Executive: What?
Customer: Uh we won't be providing field visit. Hello.
Customer: Your senior manager is like, yes yes.
Executive: Yes yes.
Customer: Ha so we cannot provide that.
Customer: Why you have a field visit right then why can't you provide that?
Executive: Because it happens with the pin code right? Pin code is not serviceable. That is the reason.
Customer: That's what I'm saying you have nearby locations you have the field visit then why can't you come for our field visit us you have a field visit option right? If we want if a person wants that then why can't you do that?
Executive: Because according to pin code we follow your pin code does not falls in serviceable area that is the reason.
Customer: So we are not providing your pin code is not serviceable area.
Customer: No no no it can you ask for some of the persons to contact higher authority or some of the persons from Cochin department to contact us.
Executive: Mam I am seeing I am only looking after this and I know.
Customer: No no where where are you calling from?
Executive: Indiamart head office Noida.
Customer: Indiamart head office. No I want a person from Cochin to contact me. That's it.
Executive: No that is not possible because according to the
Customer: Why?
Executive: Because your company is calling to us right? So it has been assigned to tele servicing which belongs to Noida head office. So that is why I'm coordinating with you.
Customer: Okay. Okay. Yes. This is the reason.
Executive: I hope you understand mam.
Customer: I will just check with my owner and I will give you a call back if anything required. Thank you.
Executive: Ha please please convey the message mam right mam. So after how much time I
Customer: I will just check and I will give you a call back give me a call back after five.
Executive: After 5 o'clock?
Customer: Yes. You may I'm or by 4:30 you can give me a call back.
Executive: I will just check I will be connect.
Customer: Ha 4:30.
Executive: Okay okay sure. Thank you thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants a field visit for their company.

- Wants someone from Cochin department to contact.



Resolution:

- Informed field visits depend on pin code serviceability.

- Explained tele-servicing assigned to Noida head office.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will check with owner and call back.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- field visit, pin code, serviceability
